code_improvements.title: Implement useInsights Hook for AI Insights
code_improvements.description: Extract insight fetching logic from InsightWidget.tsx into a reusable useInsights hook, following the UseDataResult pattern established in useAnomalies.ts.
code_improvements.rationale: Consistency in data fetching patterns simplifies component logic and enables AI insights to be consumed by other parts of the system if needed.

code_improvements.title: Add DriftWidget to Analytics Dashboard
code_improvements.description: Create a new widget to display concept drift metrics from the adaptive-learning-engine, including PSI scores and drift alerts.
code_improvements.rationale: Model drift is a critical metric for governance. Visualizing it on the dashboard allows operators to quickly identify when models need retraining or rollback.

code_improvements.title: Implement Kafka Integration Adapter
code_improvements.description: Develop a new integration adapter for sending governance events directly to Kafka topics, following the BaseIntegration pattern.
code_improvements.rationale: Many enterprise environments use Kafka as their primary event bus. Native Kafka support enables seamless integration with existing data pipelines.
